Scene Setup.description: These functions should be sent at the start of the simulation.

Movement.description: These functions move or turn the Magnebot.

Arm Articulation.description: These functions move and bend the joints of the Magnebots's arms.

Camera.description: These commands rotate the Magnebot's camera or add additional camera to the scene. They advance the simulation by 1 + skip_frames number of frames, were skip_frames is defined in the constructor.

Misc..description: These are utility functions that won't advance the simulation by any frames.

Low-level.description: These are low-level functions that you are unlikely to ever need to use.
